title: IGNITE-18592 Fix clean node before service start
body:
Ignite's base class for ducktape services prevents nodes cleanup before start.  
It's fixed now to avoid unexpected concurrent tests failures.

title: IGNITE-18348 Change deprecated Ignite.active() to IgniteCluster.activ‚Ä¶
body:
‚Ä¶e() while Ignite.active(boolean active) to Ignite.cluster().state().

Ignite.active() and Ignite.active(boolean active) are deprecated since 2018.

As per the ignite docs:

Ignite.active() -> it is recommended to use IgniteCluster.active() instead;

Ignite.active(boolean active) -> it is recommended to use IgniteCluster.active(boolean active) instead.

It seems that it is time to update these deprecated methods, update the corresponding ignite docs.

title: IGNITE-17945 Change message in case watchdog thread observes freeze
body:
In Long JVM pause detector we warn user that the thread wasn't alive for a threshold

Possible too long JVM pause: 500+ milliseconds.

But it is often treated as a GC pause.

We can change that warning to
Possible too long JVM pause: 500+ milliseconds. (GC pause or hardware temporary freeze)

To enlist possible reasons behind that behaviour

________________

title: IGNITE-17945 Change message in case watchdog thread observes freeze
body:
In Long JVM pause detector we warn user that the thread wasn't alive for a threshold.

"Possible too long JVM pause: 500+ milliseconds".

But it is often treated as a GC pause.

We can change that warning to: "Possible too long JVM pause: 500+ milliseconds. (GC pause or hardware temporary freeze)".

To enlist possible reasons behind that behaviour.
